useCase.name: Access Order Details

preconditions.precondition: User is logged in and has access to order details.

useCase.trigger: User accesses the Order Information Page.

mainSequence.step: User accesses the Order Information Page.
Order Information Page requests Order Details Page.
Model queries Order Information from Database.
Database returns Order Information to Model.
Model sends Order Details to Controller.
Controller displays Order Details to User.
